version_description: - Apple Watch support

- Calculations are now done Faster!
- Calculations are now done Faster!

- The last update caused the (Graphing, Polynomial & Linear) calculators to crash upon opening. We're really SORRY for this serious bug!
- If the crashing still exists, please consider deleting and re-installing the app!
